text: Mozambique has been in 12 Summer Olympic Games. They have never been in the Winter Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee was formed in 1979 and recognized by the International Olympic Committee the same year. ==List of medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event Maria de Lurdes Mutola 1996 Atlanta Athletics Women's 800 metres Maria de Lurdes Mutola 2000 Sydney Athletics Women's 800 metres ==Other websites== * IOC page Category:Mozambique Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Mozambique at the Olympics
